summary.body: I'm looking to get hold of 3 x original Barbican Kitchen power switches and 1 x light switch, if anybody is getting rid of theirs please do let me know. Thanks.
summary.subject: Barbican original kitchen light and power switches

summary.body: One of my hobs has stopped working, and they no longer make them. I think the salvage store is temporarily out of action at the moment, so would be grateful to hear from anyone who knows of any that are available following a kitchen refurbishment.
summary.subject: Creda hob needed

summary.body: I have posted something to the salvage forum about this - I am looking for two wardrobe door knobs for a replica unit. I  would be happy to pay for them. Thanks Max
summary.subject: wardrobe door knobs
